EmailTemplate.description: Notification to salesperson that Customer Services have requested more information from the customer.
EmailTemplate.name: CorporatePay Application Information Requested
EmailTemplate.subject: Application Information Requested - {!Account_Asset__c.Opportunity_Name__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Opportunity.OwnerFirstName},
{!Opportunity.LastModifiedBy} has requested further information for {!Opportunity.Name}.
Please view the notes on this opportunity to see what's been requested and attach any additional documents in the attachments section.
